page.title: 11BUCKNALL SCHOOL - EQUIPMENT
page.content: The{computer}is the most advanced and most up to date, not to mention the most expensive, item in the school. It has a tape recorder but that has been replaced by the quicker and quieter disk drive. The monitor is very heavy and it shows up all the things you write or program the computer to do. It came with the computer which came about two years ago. The printer did come on its own and was quite expensive but it saves the secretary and the two teachers time that would otherwise be wasted on typing and duplicating all day long. {Art}is very enjoyable where people get the choice of what to do ranging from {basketmaking, macrame, scratchboard {linowork, leatherwork, needlework, {Fischer technik}(which is a construction kit),{pastel drawing and{painting}to name but a few.
